response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet your specific needs. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting over a decade of innovation and expertise in its creation. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending this exclusive offer to you at a special price of $950,000.

We understand that such an investment is not to be taken lightly, and we are committed to ensuring that you fully appreciate the value and potential of this product. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise to provide unparalleled support and guidance throughout the integration process, ensuring a seamless transition and maximizing the return on your investment.

Please let us know if you require any additional information or have questions about the product. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this exceptional solution to your business.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
